name: Mohamed Rambil's blog
body:
Welcome to my blog !
I intend to post content I find interesting, inspiring or just fun.
I'm interested in various domains like programming (mainly web), software architecture, IT infrastructure, machine learning, big data, but also in history, linguistics, mathematics and more.

You can follow me on [github](http://moelha.github.io), on [Google plus](https://plus.google.com/+MohamedRambil) or [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/mohamed-rambil)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
